LanguageData.AT.DefaultRadiusTT: Will set this radius as default for all new bills created. Will not affect existing bills.
LanguageData.AT.MeatIngredients_Tooltip: If enabled, meat sources will be added to ingredients and will effect ideology.
LanguageData.AT.DeliverAsMuchAsYouCan_Label: Deliver As Much As You Can
LanguageData.AT.DeliverAsMuchAsYouCan_Tooltip: If enabled, pawns will try and deliver any resources that match any of the building requirements.
LanguageData.ReplaceStuff_CornerBuildable: Corner tiles are buildable and mineable from inside
LanguageData.AT_Credits: Part of the tweaks taken from: ShareTheLoad, ReplaceStuff
